law.catch_line: Finance and Administration Cabinet responsible for leasing of all property for state use.
law.text: The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall be responsible for the lease of all real property rentals required for use by all departments, agencies, and administrative bodies of the state government listed in KRS Chapter 12 that do not have statutory authority to lease property, and no lease of real property shall be binding against the Commonwealth or any agency unless made and entered into as provided in KRS 43.050, 48.111, and 56.800 to 56.823.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 44, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 98, effective April 9, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 231, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.
